text: The Golden Child is a 1986 American adventure fantasy comedy movie directed by Michael Ritchie and stars Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance, Charlotte Lewis, Randall "Tex" Cobb. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 fantasy movies Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1986 adventure movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Ritchie Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Nepal
title: The Golden Child
